MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G75 postcode area of East Kilbride. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6.00pm to safely remove generators at croftangreen and restore supplies to network connection and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.25pm on 29th October 2020.
